title: `shap.Explainer` throws a numba error
body:
Code:

```python
import shap
from sklearn.datasets import load_iris
from sklearn.neural_network import MLPClassifier

X, y = load_iris(return_X_y=True)
model = MLPClassifier()
model.fit(X, y)
explainer = shap.Explainer(model.predict_proba, X)
explanation = explainer(X)  # <- this line throws
```

Error:

<details>
 <summary>Summary Goes Here</summary>

```
 ...this is hidden, collapsable content...Stochastic Optimizer: Maximum iterations (200) reached and the optimization hasn't converged yet.

Compilation is falling back to object mode WITH looplifting enabled because Function "_compute_grey_code_row_values" failed type inference due to: Invalid use of Function(<built-in function iadd>) with argument(s) of type(s): (float64, array(float64, 1d, C))

 * (float64, float64) -> float64
 * (complex64, complex64) -> complex64
```
